about_the_game:
• Old-school 2D fantasy open world MMORPG - all the basic stuff you'd expect, like classes, monsters, loot, dungeons, quests, leveling, player trading, auction houses, talent trees, achievements, professions, and so on.
  • No pay-to-win (ever!) - the price of the game is what you see on the tin.
  • Mix of handcrafted and generated worlds and dungeons - every day Junjun the Portal Master will open up a gateway to another world that has never been visited before.
  • Player worlds - high level characters can find ways to create and manage their own worlds that others can access as well.
  • Gods and deities - discover new deities, show your allegiance to them and they'll reward you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU - 2.4GHz+
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB of VRAM: Intel HD 3000 GPU / AMD HD 5450 / Nvidia 9400 GT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU - 2.4GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: An old-school 2D fantasy open world MMORPG featuring character progression, classes, monsters, quests, guilds, dungeons, epic loot, achievements, procedural world generation, player-versus-player combat, and much more.
